comment: possibly two-step reaction (similar to R10669, R07450+R07451)
definition: 3-Dehydro-6-deoxoteasterone + 2 Oxygen + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> 3-Dehydroteasterone + 3 H2O + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
name: 3-dehydro-6-deoxoteasterone,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (3-dehydroteasterone-forming)
